00058 Vector3::Vector3( void ) {
00059   m_Data = new double[ 3 ];
00060   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < 3; i++ )
00061     m_Data[ i ] = 0.0;
00062 }
00063 
00064 Vector3::Vector3( const Vector3& v ) {
00065   m_Data = new double[ 3 ];
00066   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < 3; i++ )
00067     m_Data[ i ] = v.m_Data[ i ];
00068 }

00070 Vector3::Vector3( double x){
00071   m_Data = new double[ 3 ];
00072   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < 3; i++ )
00073     m_Data[ i ] = x;
00074 }

00076 Vector3::Vector3( double x, double y, double z ) {
00077   m_Data = new double[ 3 ];
00078   m_Data[ 0 ] = x;
00079   m_Data[ 1 ] = y;
00080   m_Data[ 2 ] = z;
00081 }

00192 // dot product
00193 //inline 
00194 double 
00195 Vector3::operator*( const Vector3& vb ) const {
00196   double res = 0.0;
00197   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < 3; i++ )
00198     res += m_Data[ i ] * vb.m_Data[ i ];
00199   return res;
00200 }
00201 
00202 // cross product
00203 //inline 
00204 Vector3 
00205 Vector3::operator^( const Vector3& vb ) const {
00206   Vector3 temp;
00207 
00208   temp.m_Data[ 0 ] = m_Data[ 1 ] * vb.m_Data[ 2 ] - m_Data[ 2 ] * vb.m_Data[ 1 ];
00209   temp.m_Data[ 1 ] = m_Data[ 2 ] * vb.m_Data[ 0 ] - m_Data[ 0 ] * vb.m_Data[ 2 ];
00210   temp.m_Data[ 2 ] = m_Data[ 0 ] * vb.m_Data[ 1 ] - m_Data[ 1 ] * vb.m_Data[ 0 ];
00211 
00212   return temp;
00213 }

00215 //inline 
00216 double 
00217 Vector3::norm( void ) const {
00218   return sqrt( ( *this ) * ( *this ) );
00219 }
00220 
00221 //inline
00222 double 
00223 Vector3::norm2( void ) const {
00224   return ( *this ) * ( *this );
00225 }
00226 
00227 //inline 
00228 Vector3& 
00229 Vector3::normalize( void ) {
00230   if ( norm2() < 1e-10 )
00231     return *this;
00232   *this /= norm();
00233   return *this;
00234 }

00253 Matrix33::Matrix33() {
00254   m_Data = new double[ 3 * 3 ];
00255 }
00256 
00257 Matrix33::Matrix33( const Matrix33& m ) {
00258   m_Data = new double[ 3 * 3 ];
00259   for ( Identifier i = 0; i < 3*3; i++ )
00260     m_Data[ i ] = m.m_Data[ i ];
00261 }

00263 Matrix33::~Matrix33() {
00264   delete[] m_Data;
00265 };

00281 Matrix33::operator() ( Identifier col ) {
00282   Vector3 v;
00283   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < 3; ++i )
00284     v( i ) = ( *this ) ( i, col );
00285   return v;

00341 Matrix33 
00342 Matrix33::operator/( const double& x ) {
00343   Matrix33 temp;
00344   double ix = 1.0 / x;
00345   for ( Identifier i = 0; i < 3*3; i++ )
00346     temp.m_Data[ i ] = m_Data[ i ] * ix;
00347   return temp;

00351 void 
00352 Matrix33::set_diag( Vector3 diag ) {
00353   *this = 0.0;
00354   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < 3; ++i ) {
00355     ( *this ) ( i, i ) = diag( i );
00356   }
00357 }

00359 void 
00360 Matrix33::Eigen( Vector3& lambda, std::vector<Vector3>& V ) const {
00361   gsl_matrix_view m = gsl_matrix_view_array( m_Data, 3, 3 );
00362   gsl_vector *eval = gsl_vector_alloc ( 3 );
00363   gsl_matrix *evec = gsl_matrix_alloc ( 3, 3 );
00364   gsl_eigen_symmv_workspace * w = gsl_eigen_symmv_alloc ( 3 );
00365 
00366   gsl_eigen_symmv ( &m.matrix, eval, evec, w );
00367   gsl_eigen_symmv_free ( w );
00368   //gsl_eigen_symmv_sort ( eval, evec, GSL_EIGEN_SORT_ABS_ASC );
00369   gsl_eigen_symmv_sort ( eval, evec, GSL_EIGEN_SORT_VAL_ASC );
00370 
00371   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < 3; ++i ) {
00372     //double eval_i = gsl_vector_get (eval, i);
00373     gsl_vector_view evec_i = gsl_matrix_column (evec, i);
00374     lambda( i ) = gsl_vector_get ( eval, i );
00375     V.push_back( Vector3() );
00376         
00377     for ( unsigned j = 0; j < 3; ++j )
00378       (V.at(i))(j) = gsl_vector_get( &evec_i.vector, j );
00379     //V( i, j ) = gsl_matrix_get( evec, i, j );
00380   }
00381 }
00382 
00383 double 
00384 Matrix33::det( void ) const {
00385   Vector3 l;
00386   std::vector<Vector3> V;
00387   this->Eigen( l, V );
00388   double d = 1.0;
00389   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < 3; ++i )
00390     d *= l( i );
00391   return d;
00392 }
00393 
00394 Vector3 
00395 Matrix33::get_invariants(std::vector<Vector3>& V) const {
00396   Vector3 EV,inv;
00397   Eigen(EV,V);
00398   inv(0)=EV(0)+EV(1)+EV(2);
00399   inv(1)=EV(0)*EV(1)+EV(1)*EV(2)+EV(0)*EV(2);
00400   inv(2)=EV(0)*EV(1)*EV(2);
00401   return inv;
00402 }
00403 
00404 #define ROTATE(a,i,j,k,l) g=(a)(i,j);h=(a)(k,l);(a)(i,j)=g-s*(h+g*tau);\
00405     (a)(k,l)=h+s*(g-h*tau);
00406 
00407 void 
00408 Matrix33::Jacobi( Vector3& lambda, Matrix33& V, int &nrot ) {
00409   int j, iq, ip, i;
00410   double tresh, theta, tau, t, sm, s, h, g, c;
00411   double *b = new double[ 3 ],
00412     *z = new double[ 3 ];
00413 
00414   //... set output matrix to identity matrix ...
00415   for ( ip = 0; ip < 3; ip++ ) {
00416     for ( iq = 0; iq < 3; iq++ )
00417       V( ip, iq ) = 0.0;
00418     V( ip, ip ) = 1.0;
00419   }
00420 
00421   for ( ip = 0; ip < 3; ip++ ) {
00422     b[ ip ] = lambda( ip ) = ( *this ) ( ip, ip );
00423     z[ ip ] = 0.0;
00424   }
00425   nrot = 0;
00426   for ( i = 0; i < 50;i++ ) {
00427     sm = 0.0;
00428     for ( ip = 0; ip < 2;ip++ ) {
00429       for ( iq = ip + 1;iq < 3; ++iq )
00430     sm += fabs( ( *this ) ( ip, iq ) );
00431     }
00432     if ( sm == 0.0 ) {
00433       delete[] b;
00434       delete[] z;
00435       return ;
00436     }
00437     if ( i < 4 )
00438       tresh = 0.2 * sm / ( 3 * 3 );
00439     else
00440       tresh = 0.0;
00441     for ( ip = 0; ip < 2; ip++ ) {
00442       for ( iq = ip + 1; iq < 3; iq++ ) {
00443     g = 100.0 * fabs( ( *this ) ( ip, iq ) );
00444     if ( i > 4 && ( double ) ( fabs( lambda( ip ) ) + g ) == ( double ) fabs( lambda( ip ) )
00445          && ( double ) ( fabs( lambda( iq ) ) + g ) == ( double ) fabs( lambda( iq ) ) )
00446       ( *this ) ( ip, iq ) = 0.0;
00447     else if ( fabs( ( *this ) ( ip, iq ) ) > tresh ) {
00448       h = lambda( iq ) - lambda( ip );
00449       if ( ( double ) ( fabs( h ) + g ) == ( double ) fabs( h ) )
00450         t = ( ( *this ) ( ip, iq ) ) / h;
00451       else {
00452         theta = 0.5 * h / ( ( *this ) ( ip, iq ) );
00453         t = 1.0 / ( fabs( theta ) + sqrt( 1.0 + theta * theta ) );
00454         if ( theta < 0.0 )
00455           t = -t;
00456       }
00457       c = 1.0 / sqrt( 1 + t * t );
00458       s = t * c;
00459       tau = s / ( 1.0 + c );
00460       h = t * ( ( *this ) ( ip, iq ) );
00461       z[ ip ] -= h;
00462       z[ iq ] += h;
00463       lambda( ip ) -= h;
00464       lambda( iq ) += h;
00465       ( *this ) ( ip, iq ) = 0.0;
00466       for ( j = 0; j < ip - 1; ++j ) {
00467         ROTATE( *this, j, ip, j, iq );
00468       }
00469       for ( j = ip + 1;j <= iq - 1; ++j ) {
00470         ROTATE( *this, ip, j, j, iq );
00471       }
00472       for ( j = iq + 1;j < 3; ++j ) {
00473         ROTATE( *this, ip, j, iq, j );
00474       }
00475       for ( j = 0;j < 3; ++j ) {
00476         ROTATE( V, j, ip, j, iq );
00477       }
00478       ++nrot;
00479     }
00480       }
00481     }
00482     for ( ip = 0; ip < 3; ++ip ) {
00483       b[ ip ] += z[ ip ];
00484       lambda( ip ) = b[ ip ];
00485       z[ ip ] = 0.0;
00486     }
00487   }
00488   std::cerr << "Error : Too many iterations in routine Jacobi";
00489   delete[] b;
00490   delete[] z;
00491 }
